work.sectionSubtitle: Two real client projects. From brief to launch.

wt-erdbewegungen.title: WT Erdbewegungen
wt-erdbewegungen.description: Website for a local excavation company. Fast, responsive, built for local search.
wt-erdbewegungen.problem: No web presence. Customers couldn't find the business online.
wt-erdbewegungen.approach: Clean, mobile-first site with strong local SEO and fast load times.
wt-erdbewegungen.outcome: Under 2 second load on mobile. Ranking for local search terms.

daisymays-salon.title: Daisy May's Salon
daisymays-salon.description: Bilingual website for a dog grooming salon. German and English.
daisymays-salon.problem: All enquiries went through phone and social media. No single source for services and pricing.
daisymays-salon.approach: Responsive site with i18n, clear pricing, and direct contact options.
daisymays-salon.outcome: Fewer repeat calls. Customers find what they need in their language.
